data.eml:eml: A New Species of Abbrosoga (Hemiptera: Fulgoroidea: Delphacidae), An Endemic Puerto Rican Planthopper Genus, with an Updated Checklist of the Delphacidae of Puerto Rico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Otero, Miriel, Bartlett, Charles R. (2019): A New Species of Abbrosoga (Hemiptera: Fulgoroidea: Delphacidae), An Endemic Puerto Rican Planthopper Genus, with an Updated Checklist of the Delphacidae of Puerto Rico. Zootaxa 4563 (2): 372-386, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4563.2.10
